content: Protect all documents in this room with watermarks. If a document already contains one, it will not be replaced.

comment.text: This translation key is used for the button text "AddWatermarksToDocuments" in a dialog component, prompting users to apply watermarks to documents.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Protect all documents...' is a bit literal. A more natural Armenian phrasing might be 'Add watermarks to all documents...' or 'Apply watermarks to all documents...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ավելորեք ջրանշաններ այս սենյակի բոլոր փաստաթղթերին: (Add watermarks to all documents in this room)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'replacement' is somewhat implicit. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be to explicitly state that existing watermarks will be preserved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Եթե փաստաթուղթն արդեն պարունակում է ջրանշան, այն չի փոխարինվի, այլ պահպանվի: (If a document already contains a watermark, it will not be replaced, but preserved.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "incripționare" translates to "encryption," but the English text refers to "watermarks." This is a significant mistranslation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Protejează toate documentele din această sală cu filigranare. Un filigran deja existent nu va fi înlocuit.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'incripționare' might be used colloquially, 'filigranare' is the correct term for watermark. Using 'incripționare' obscures the meaning.

The phrase "ආරක්ෂා කරන්න" (araksha karanna) translates to 'protect' but in this context, 'add' or 'apply' would be more accurate and natural for adding watermarks. 'Protect' implies a level of security that isn't the primary function of watermarks here.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම කාමරයේ ඇති සියලු ලේඛන ජල සලකුණු යෙදවීමෙන් ආරක්ෂා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "එක ඇත්නම්" (eka athinma) is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ලේඛනයක දැනටමත් ජල සලකුණක් තිබේ නම්,

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word “ප්‍රතිස්ථාපනය” (prathistapana) is a formal term, while a simpler word like “ඉවත්” (iwa) - 'removed' or 'replaced' would be more conversational and understandable for most users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ලේඛනයක දැනටමත් ජල සලකුණක් තිබේ නම්, එය ඉවත් නොකරනු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'жиговима' is a bit awkward. While technically correct, 'шарама' might be a more natural and commonly used term for watermarks in this context, conveying a more visual aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Заштитите све документе у овој соби водене шаре.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'watermark' is directly transliterated. While understandable, a more natural Vietnamese equivalent for this context might be 'dấu bướm nước' or simply 'dấu mờ' for a less technical feel. Using 'watermark' directly can sound awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'dấu bướm nước' or 'dấu mờ' instead of 'watermark' to improve readability and naturalness.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly rigid. Adding a connector like 'nhưng' or 'thì' before 'nó sẽ không được thay thế' would improve the flow and make it sound more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'nó sẽ không được thay thế' to 'thì nó sẽ không được thay thế' or 'nhưng nó sẽ không được thay thế'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "使用水印保护" (use watermarks to protect) is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing in Chinese. A more common and natural phrasing would emphasize the *application* of watermarks.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 为所有文档添加水印保护此房间中的所有文档。 (Wèi suǒyǒu wéndàng tiānjiā shuǐyìn bǎohù cǐ fángjiān zhōng de suǒyǒu wéndàng.) - This translates to 'Add watermarks to protect all documents in this room.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English states 'If a document already contains one, it will not be replaced.' The Chinese translation captures the 'will not be replaced' part, but a smoother flow might be achieved by phrasing it more proactively. The current phrasing is a little passive.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 如果文档已包含水印，则不会重复添加。(Rúguǒ wéndàng yǐ bāohán shuǐyìn, zé bù huì chóngfù tiānjiā.) - This translates to 'If a document already contains a watermark, it will not be added again.'
